Columns.Description: Type of agent the event was collected from. Possible values are OpsManager Linux and AzureStorage.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Source of the event.
Columns.Name: Source

Columns.Description: Name of the event log that the event was collected from.
Columns.Name: EventLog

Columns.Description: Name of the computer that the event was collected from.
Columns.Name: Computer

Columns.Description: Severity of the event in numeric form.
Columns.Name: EventLevel

Columns.Description: Severity of the event in text form.
Columns.Name: EventLevelName

Columns.Description: Event parameter values in XML format.
Columns.Name: ParameterXml

Columns.Description: All event data in raw format.
Columns.Name: EventData

Columns.Description: Number of the event.
Columns.Name: EventID

Columns.Description: Event description with parameter values.
Columns.Name: RenderedDescription

Columns.Description: Azure deployment ID of the cloud service the log belongs to. Only populated when events are collected using Azure Diagnostics agent and collected from Azure storage.
Columns.Name: AzureDeploymentID

Columns.Description: Role of the cloud service the log belongs to. Only populated when events are collected using Azure Diagnostics agent and collected from Azure storage.
Columns.Name: Role

Columns.Description: Category of the event.
Columns.Name: EventCategory

Columns.Description: User name of the account that logged the event.
Columns.Name: UserName

Columns.Description: Event message for the different Languages. The language is defined by the LCID attribute.
Columns.Name: Message

Columns.Description: Name of the management group for System Center Operations Manager agents. For other agents this value is AOI-<workspace ID>
Columns.Name: ManagementGroupName

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
